briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety Trial of 12 Weeks of Treatment With Nebulized SUN-101 in Patients With COPD
officialTitle: Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Parallel-Group, Multicenter, Efficacy and Safety Trial of 12 Weeks of Treatment With Nebulized SUN-101 in Patients With COPD: GOLDEN-3 (Glycopyrrolate for Obstructive Lung Disease Via Electronic Nebulizer)

interventions.name: Placebo BID eFlow Closed System (CS) nebulizer

summary: This is a trial of 12 weeks of treatment with nebulized SUN-101 using an Investigational eFlowÂ® Closed System (CS) nebulizer in subjects with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) according to the Global Initiative for Chronic Obstructive Lung Disease (GOLD 2014) guidelines.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Trough Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 Second (FEV1) at Week 12
